name: Two-Gate Tee Corridor
setup: Place two alignment sticks 6 yards apart at 120 yards as a visual corridor.
execution: Hit 12 smooth tee shots focusing on starting the ball between the sticks.
scoring: Count starts inside the corridor out of 12.
constraints: Use one pre-shot routine every ball

name: Paint-Stripe Start Check
setup: Mark face with spray and set one stick on target line.
execution: Hit 15 drives and note start direction plus face strike location.
scoring: Measure average left-right start-line distance at 100 yards.
progression_hint: Alternate center and slight fade starts.

name: Left-Right Window Alternator
setup: Pick a left flag and right flag at similar distance.
execution: Alternate starts at left then right flag for 14 shots.
scoring: Successful start on intended side is 1 point.
progression_hint: Reduce acceptable miss window to 5 yards.

name: Random Tee Target Callout
setup: Assign three tee targets: left, center, right.
execution: Every 20 seconds call a target and hit one committed shot.
scoring: Pass only if ball starts in called lane.

name: First-Tee Line Under Pressure
setup: Create a 30-yard fairway at 220 yards.
execution: Hit 9 simulated first-tee balls with full routine.
scoring: Score 0 for lane hit, 1 for miss. Lowest total wins.

name: Driver Contact Ladder
setup: Apply impact tape and tee ball at normal height.
execution: Hit 10 drives at 70% speed aiming for center-face contact.
scoring: Count centered strikes out of 10.
progression_hint: Lower tee slightly for final 5 reps.

name: Tee Height Matrix
setup: Use low, medium, and high tee heights in three sets.
execution: Hit 5 balls per tee height and track strike pattern.
scoring: Best set is smallest strike dispersion cluster.
progression_hint: Repeat best height at normal speed.

name: Strike-Then-Speed Build
setup: Set three speed zones: 70%, 80%, 90%.
execution: Hit 4 balls per zone, keeping centered contact.
scoring: Percent of centered strikes while moving through zones.

name: Random Clubface Check
setup: Flip coin to assign slight high-tee or low-tee setup each ball.
execution: Hit 12 drives and adapt strike location target each flip.
scoring: Pass when strike is inside intended quarter of face.
progression_hint: Use three-way randomizer instead of coin.

name: Center-Strike Survivor
setup: Start with 12 points.
execution: Hit 12 drives; centered strike gains 1, heel/toe loses 2.
scoring: Finish with positive points to pass.

name: Half-Swing Distance Tune
setup: Pick one 70-yard and one 90-yard target.
execution: Hit 5 balls to each with controlled half swings.
scoring: Average carry distance error in yards.

name: Three-Yardage Triangle
setup: Set targets at 105, 125, and 145 yards.
execution: Cycle through targets for 15 shots, changing club as needed.
scoring: Track average carry miss for each yardage.
constraints: One shot per target before rotating

name: Back-Flag Front-Flag Match
setup: Choose two flags separated by 12-18 yards.
execution: Alternate front and back flag shots for 12 reps.
scoring: Percent finishing pin-high corridor.
constraints: Commit to carry number before swing

name: Random Number Approach
setup: Generate random targets between 90 and 165 yards.
execution: Hit one ball per number for 10 calls.
scoring: 1 point per shot landing within 10 yards of call.
constraints: No second ball at same number

name: Scoring Zone Distance Pressure
setup: Use a single target at 120-135 yards.
execution: Hit 10 balls; each must finish inside 20-yard circle.
scoring: Miss outside circle counts as 1 stroke penalty.
constraints: No more than 25 seconds per shot

name: Stick-Line Iron Starts
setup: Lay one stick on ground toward center target.
execution: Hit 10 smooth 7-irons starting ball on stick line.
scoring: Starts within 3 yards of line are successful.

name: Narrow Gate Iron Drill
setup: Place gate 2 yards in front of ball, one ball-width wider than clubhead.
execution: Hit 14 shots through gate toward 130-yard target.
scoring: Gate clears divided by total attempts.

name: Draw-Fade Start Pairing
setup: Pick a center flag and two side start windows.
execution: Hit alternating draw and fade starts for 12 total shots.
scoring: Pass each shot only if it starts in correct window.

name: Random Lie Start Test
setup: Mix fairway mat, light rough, and slight downhill lies.
execution: Hit 9 one-ball approaches from randomized lies.
scoring: Add 1 penalty for any start over 6 yards offline.

name: Single-Ball Iron Pressure Set
setup: Pick one flag and define a 6-yard start corridor.
execution: Hit 10 single-ball attempts with full routine.
scoring: Need 7/10 corridor starts to pass.

name: Wedge Tempo Calibration
setup: Set one target at 60 yards.
execution: Hit 12 wedges at same rhythm and finish height.
scoring: Count shots landing within 8 yards of target.

name: Clock-Face Wedge Grid
setup: Use 8:30, 9:30, and 10:30 swing lengths.
execution: Hit 4 balls per length and record carry average.
scoring: Measure spread between longest and shortest miss per length.

name: One-Hop Landing Ladder
setup: Place towels at 20, 30, and 40 yards.
execution: Try to land first bounce on called towel for 15 reps.
scoring: Direct one-hop hits over total shots.

name: Random Wedge Number Game
setup: Generate random wedge calls from 35 to 95 yards.
execution: Hit one ball per call for 10 total calls.
scoring: Inside 7 yards is par, outside is bogey.
progression_hint: Use 5-yard inside target for birdie scoring.

name: Wedge Up-and-Down Pressure
setup: Set six wedge shots between 35 and 60 yards.
execution: Play each ball as one wedge plus one putt opportunity.
scoring: Track total strokes to hole out all six balls.
progression_hint: Add penalty stroke for missed green.

name: Brush-Then-Ball Chips
setup: Draw a chalk line and place ball just ahead of it.
execution: Hit 12 chips brushing turf on line then ball.
scoring: Pass rep when strike sequence is line then ball.

name: Tight-Lie Contact Builder
setup: Use closely mown area with target at 20 feet.
execution: Hit 15 chips focusing on ball-first contact and low finish.
scoring: Clean strikes finishing on green count as success.

name: Rough Contact Exit Drill
setup: Drop balls in light and medium rough near green.
execution: Hit 12 shots, keeping club speed through impact.
scoring: Ball on green inside 10 feet is successful.
progression_hint: Include one buried rough lie every three balls.

name: Random Lie Chip Relay
setup: Assign coin heads to putter-like chip and tails to lofted chip.
execution: Flip before each of 10 random lies and play called shot.
scoring: Total strokes to hole out all balls.
progression_hint: Set par target and beat it by 2.

name: Must-Get-On Greenside Test
setup: Choose 10 mixed greenside lies around one hole.
execution: Hit each shot once with full routine.
scoring: Pass requires 9/10 balls on putting surface.
constraints: Restart count if two misses in row

name: Bunker Splash Baseline
setup: Draw entry line 2 inches behind ball in bunker.
execution: Hit 10 splash shots entering sand on line.
scoring: Success when shot exits bunker and lands on green.

name: Three-Distance Sand Ladder
setup: Set targets at 8, 15, and 22 yards from bunker.
execution: Hit 4 balls to each target in ladder order.
scoring: Average landing distance error by target.
constraints: No change in swing length on short target

name: Uphill-Downhill Bunker Pair
setup: Create five uphill and five downhill bunker lies.
execution: Alternate lie types and adapt setup for each shot.
scoring: Shots finishing on green inside 15 feet.
progression_hint: Add one plugged lie every set.

name: Random Bunker Spot Draw
setup: Number six bunker positions around one green.
execution: Draw random numbers and play one ball from each draw.
scoring: Count strokes to get six balls holed.

name: Sand Save Sprint
setup: Place six balls in mixed bunker lies.
execution: Play each as bunker shot then putt to hole out.
scoring: Track up-and-down count and total strokes.
constraints: No rake smoothing before final two balls

name: Lag Pace Warm Start
setup: Set tees at 20, 30, and 40 feet.
execution: Hit 3 putts to each tee distance.
scoring: Count balls finishing within 3-foot zone.
constraints: No putt over target by more than 4 feet

name: Long Putt Leap Zones
setup: Draw 3-foot circles at 25, 35, and 45 feet.
execution: Putt 4 balls to each circle in sequence.
scoring: Measure average leave distance from circle center.
constraints: No ball reuse until full set complete

name: Uphill-Downhill Lag Pairing
setup: Pick one uphill and one downhill 30+ foot putt.
execution: Alternate slope putts for 12 total attempts.
scoring: Putts finishing inside 3 feet count as success.
progression_hint: Require uphill and downhill both inside 2.5 feet.

name: Random Distance Lag Draw
setup: Prepare distance cards from 18 to 50 feet.
execution: Draw a card, putt one ball to that distance, repeat 10 times.
scoring: 1 point for inside 3 feet, 2 points for outside.

name: No-Three-Putt Pressure Nine
setup: Set 9 first putts between 25 and 45 feet.
execution: Play each ball until holed as a separate hole.
scoring: Any 3-putt adds 2 penalty strokes.
progression_hint: Target zero penalties for two sessions.
constraints: No repeat attempts from same start

name: Short Putt Gate Primer
setup: Create gate one foot ahead of ball for 4-foot putts.
execution: Roll 12 putts through gate and into cup.
scoring: Count makes out of 12.

name: Four-Foot Circle Builder
setup: Place 8 balls around hole at 4 feet.
execution: Putt full circle twice using same process each putt.
scoring: Made putts divided by 16 total.

name: Break-Side Short Putts
setup: Find left-to-right and right-to-left 5-foot putts.
execution: Hit 6 putts each direction, matching start line to read.
scoring: Pass when chosen start line and pace are both committed.
progression_hint: Add slight uphill and downhill versions.
constraints: No second read while over ball

name: Random Spot Money Putts
setup: Draw random short-putt distances and place ball accordingly.
execution: Putt 10 random attempts with full routine.
scoring: Misses count as 2 points, makes 0. Lower is better.
constraints: No same distance twice in a row

name: Must-Make Ladder Finish
setup: Set putts at 3, 4, 5, and 6 feet.
execution: Make each in order; a miss sends you back one step.
scoring: Pass when full ladder cleared three times.

name: Safe-Side Planning Warmup
setup: Pick three upcoming holes and mark safest miss side.
execution: State target and miss side before each tee shot.
scoring: Pass each hole if decision was declared before swing.

name: Club-Choice Decision Matrix
setup: Create 10 approach scenarios with wind and lie notes.
execution: Choose club and landing target before each shot.
scoring: Decision rated correct if outcome matches intended pattern.
progression_hint: Add one conservative and one aggressive option each rep.

name: Risk Line Commitment Drill
setup: Define a no-go hazard line and a safe target corridor.
execution: Play 12 simulated holes choosing aggressive or safe line each time.
scoring: Hazard-line crosses add 2 penalty strokes.
progression_hint: Use tighter safe corridor after consistent success.
constraints: Decision must be final before address

name: Random Scenario Decision Cards
setup: Prepare cards with lie, wind, and score situation.
execution: Draw 10 cards, call strategy in 15 seconds, then hit shot.
scoring: Pass if strategy matches highest-percentage option for scenario.

name: Closing-Hole Strategy Pressure
setup: Simulate holes 16-18 with a one-shot lead.
execution: Play each hole using conservative game plan and commit to targets.
scoring: Track total strokes and any avoidable decision errors.
constraints: Log decision quality after each hole
